names.pinyin: shi guan ai san hao fang

actions: Tonifies and augments the Heart and Spleen, nourishes the Blood and calms the Spirit.
Clears Heat, resolves Fire toxicity and vents and disperses External Wind-Heat.
Nourishes Kidney Yin, clears Lung Heat, sedates Fire, moistens the Lungs, nourishes the Kidneys, generates fluids and resolves Phlegm.
Tonifies, invigorates and harmonizes the Blood, reduces swelling, expels pus, generates flesh, stops cough, treats dyspnea and alleviates pain.
With Bai Shao, regulates and harmonizes Qi and Blood.
With Jin Yin Hua, reduces obstruction and toxicity for swollen, painful sores and necrosis of surrounding tissue.
Nourishes Yin, moistens the Lungs, dispels Phlegm and stops cough.
Nourishes Yin, clears Heat, cools the Blood, softens hardness, dissipates nodules, drains Fire and relieves toxicity.
With Jin Yin Hua and Dang Gui, for deep rooted, sores and ulcers.
Nourishes Stomach, Kidney and Lung Yin, clears Heat and generates fluids.
Nourishes the Blood, astringes Yin, softens the Liver and relieves pain.
With Dang Gui, nourishes Yin and Blood.
Promotes urination, leaches out Dampness, strengthens the Spleen and harmonizes the Middle Jiao.
With Bai Zhu, strengthens the Spleen and resolves Dampness.
Tonifies the Spleen, augments Qi, dries Dampness and promotes water metabolism.
